exploitSteps: Object.assign merge at PROJECT_ROOT/sample_app.js:8 executes and merge attacker JSON into existing objects
Polluted data reaches gadget.rce.child_process.exec, enabling attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands
flowChains.description: Attacker input from POST /api/user reaches Object.assign merge at PROJECT_ROOT/sample_app.js:8, allowing an adversary to merge attacker JSON into existing objects. The polluted state then enables them to execute arbitrary OS commands.
flowChains.validation: Requires authenticated request (x-auth header). No schema stripping detected; prototype keys will be accepted. Send payload below as JSON body. Replay the payload below to observe prototype pollution.

payloadVariants.label: JSON body
payloadVariants.notes: Send JSON body with polluted `__proto__` keys to merge operations (Object.assign/lodash).
steps: POST POST /api/user with a JSON body that includes prototype keys.
If validation removes unknown keys, switch to constructor.prototype keys.

exploitSteps: Object.assign merge at PROJECT_ROOT/sample_app.js:14 executes and merge attacker JSON into existing objects
Polluted data reaches gadget.rce.child_process.exec, enabling attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands
flowChains.description: Attacker input from POST /api/settings reaches Object.assign merge at PROJECT_ROOT/sample_app.js:14, allowing an adversary to merge attacker JSON into existing objects. The polluted state then enables them to execute arbitrary OS commands.
flowChains.validation: Reachable anonymously. No schema stripping detected; prototype keys will be accepted. Send payload below as JSON body. Replay the payload below to observe prototype pollution.

payloadVariants.label: JSON body
payloadVariants.notes: Send JSON body with polluted `__proto__` keys to merge operations (Object.assign/lodash).
steps: POST POST /api/settings with a JSON body that includes prototype keys.
If validation removes unknown keys, switch to constructor.prototype keys.

fingerprints.name: DOMPurify
fingerprints.impact: Bypass DOMPurify allowlists and execute arbitrary HTML/JS.
fingerprints.requirement: Set ALLOWED_TAGS/ALLOWED_ATTR or documentMode before DOMPurify initializes.

fingerprints.name: sanitize-html
fingerprints.impact: Keep dangerous attributes/text when sanitize-html runs.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute wildcard attribute arrays or innerText so sanitize-html re-injects scripts.

fingerprints.name: Segment Analytics.js
fingerprints.impact: Force Segment to inject attacker-controlled scripts via crafted template wrappers.
fingerprints.requirement: Populate Object.prototype.script wrappers before analytics.js loads.

fingerprints.name: Google Tag Manager / dataLayer
fingerprints.impact: Load attacker scripts or reconfigure GTM tags.
fingerprints.requirement: Inject poisoned entries into dataLayer/analytics queues (vtp_* or q[][].

fingerprints.name: Google Analytics / gtag
fingerprints.impact: Redirect GA trackers or execute scripts via custom transport URLs.
fingerprints.requirement: Override gtag/ga configuration before trackers initialize.

fingerprints.name: Akamai Boomerang
fingerprints.impact: Make Boomerang load attacker JS through BOOMR.url or preload logic.
fingerprints.requirement: Set BOOMR.url (or nested config) before the loader runs.

fingerprints.name: Tealium Universal Tag
fingerprints.impact: Load attacker-controlled scripts/iframes via utag loaders.
fingerprints.requirement: Override utag loader attributes (attrs/src) prior to tag injection.

fingerprints.name: Adobe Dynamic Tag Management
fingerprints.impact: Abuse Adobe DTM to pull attacker content or modify tag options.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute _satellite configuration fields before DTM bootstrap.

fingerprints.name: Wistia Embedded Video
fingerprints.impact: Inject attacker HTML via wistiaEmbeds’ template rendering.
fingerprints.requirement: Override template attributes such as innerHTML before Wistia renders the chrome.

fingerprints.name: Embedly Cards
fingerprints.impact: Force Embedly iframe builders to use attacker-defined attributes.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `__proto__` keys like `onload`, `override`, or frame defaults before `window.embedly` runs.

fingerprints.name: js-xss (filterXSS)
fingerprints.impact: Bypass js-xss whitelists so event attributes survive sanitization.
fingerprints.requirement: Override `whiteList` entries on `Object.prototype` before `filterXSS` executes.

fingerprints.name: Knockout.js
fingerprints.impact: Inject arbitrary expressions into Knockout templates.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute array indexes used by `ko.expressionRewriting` (e.g., `__proto__[4]`, `__proto__[5]`).

fingerprints.name: Lodash Template
fingerprints.impact: Execute arbitrary JS via lodash `_.template` sourceURL injection.
fingerprints.requirement: Set `sourceURL` or template options on `Object.prototype` before `_.template` is called.

fingerprints.name: Marionette / Backbone Views
fingerprints.impact: Render attacker-controlled DOM nodes via polluted `tagName`/attributes.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `tagName`, `src`, and `onerror` defaults before Marionette views extend Backbone.

fingerprints.name: Google reCAPTCHA
fingerprints.impact: Inject HTML into reCAPTCHA iframes via polluted attributes.
fingerprints.requirement: Override iframe properties like `srcdoc` or Trusted Types fallbacks before widgets render.

fingerprints.name: Sprint.js
fingerprints.impact: Wrap DOM strings with attacker HTML when Sprint normalizes nodes.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `wrapMap` entries such as `div.intro` before Sprint parses markup.

fingerprints.name: Swiftype Site Search
fingerprints.impact: Execute arbitrary hooks because Swiftype evals user-provided functions.
fingerprints.requirement: Override `_userServerConfiguration.install.hooks` via prototype pollution (e.g., `__proto__[xxx]`).

fingerprints.name: Twitter Universal Website Tag
fingerprints.impact: Load attacker-controlled URLs inside hidden iframes.
fingerprints.requirement: Set `hif[]` or `tags[]` arrays before `twq('track', ...)` executes.

fingerprints.name: Zepto.js
fingerprints.impact: Create DOM nodes with polluted attributes/event handlers.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute defaults such as `html` or event attributes before invoking `Zepto` helpers.

fingerprints.name: Popper.js
fingerprints.impact: Inject event handlers when Popper applies attributes to tooltip elements.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `arrow`, `reference`, or `popper` attribute maps (e.g., `ontransitionend`).

fingerprints.name: Pendo Agent
fingerprints.impact: Hijack analytics calls by pointing Pendo data hosts to attacker-controlled URLs.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `dataHost` / `PendoConfig` prior to agent initialization.

fingerprints.name: i18next
fingerprints.impact: Replace translation lookups with attacker-provided HTML.
fingerprints.requirement: Override `lng`, namespace separators, or translation keys on the prototype before `i18next.init` runs.

fingerprints.name: Demandbase Tag
fingerprints.impact: Force Demandbase to fetch recommendations from attacker infrastructure.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `Demandbase.Config.SiteOptimization` (e.g., `recommendationApiURL`).

fingerprints.name: Analytics.js GTM Plugin
fingerprints.impact: Load arbitrary GTM script URLs inside analytics.js integrations.
fingerprints.requirement: Set `customScriptSrc` through pollution before calling `analyticsGtagManager`.

fingerprints.name: Mutiny Personalization
fingerprints.impact: Mutiny query parser copies polluted properties into global config.
fingerprints.requirement: Send `__proto__` query parameters so Mutiny merges them into its routing object.

fingerprints.name: AMP Runtime
fingerprints.impact: Inject attacker entries into AMP command queue for DOM XSS.
fingerprints.requirement: Pollute `AMP.push` payloads before AMP bootstrap drains queued actions.

fingerprints.name: Google Closure Sanitizer
fingerprints.impact: Bypass Closure HTML sanitizers and load attacker bundles.
fingerprints.requirement: Override `trustedTypes`, `emptyHTML`, or `CLOSURE_BASE_PATH` before Closure base loads.
